name: capstone-v2
description: Capstone V2 - GSM Frontend with Microservices Backend

scripts.start: concurrently --kill-others --prefix-colors "cyan,magenta,yellow,green,blue" --names "frontend,auth,scholarship,aid,monitoring" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:auth" "npm run dev:scholarship" "npm run dev:aid" "npm run dev:monitoring"
scripts.dev:all: concurrently --kill-others --prefix-colors "cyan,magenta,yellow,green,blue" --names "frontend,auth,scholarship,aid,monitoring" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:auth" "npm run dev:scholarship" "npm run dev:aid" "npm run dev:monitoring"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd GSM && npm install && cd ../microservices/auth_service && composer install && cd ../scholarship_service && composer install && cd ../aid_service && composer install && cd ../monitoring_service && composer install
